channel.title: Members portal
channel.description:
Ok title says it all i need a code that would create a portal ant teleport player to my selected cordinates but only members shud be able to use that portal thanks to who ever helps
P.S. i've searched forums and couldnt find anything related to that so i'm posting here

item.title: Members portal
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

it would be better like

case !!!!: // portal for whatever if (playerIsMember == 1) ; if (objectX == #?#? && objectY == ?#?#) { teleportToX = @@@@; teleportToY = @@@@; sendMessage("PORTAL MESSAGE HERE."); } else; } sendMessage("You need to be a member to go in here"); return; break;
Now, that most likely isnt correct, the ‘else’ part, because I forget how to say that in Java, (like i cant remember how to write it down correct because I havent coded in a while)
But, that will make it so if your not a member, you get sent that message, and you dont tele.

Read full topic

item.title: Members portal
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

umm… you could try the changing

if (playerIsMember == 1) ;

to if (playerIsMember >= 1) ;…
But I doubt that will work. What the == means is that the player-IsMember has to be exactly 1 to use it, but the >= means that the player-IsMember has to be 1 or above. I have no idea why it would be above one, but it might work.

Again, i’m unreliable.
Steven is awesome at java, so take his advice over mine.

~Retard Monkey

Read full topic

item.title: Members portal
item.dc:creator: @_Paranoia †Paranoia†
item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

[quote=“Retard Monkey, post:2, topic:231599”]umm ill try to help but i’m warning you, i’m unrealiable.

OK, go into your client.java and find:

    public void NewObjects() {

Add this below it:

	makeGlobalObject(!!!!, #?#?, ?#?#, 0, 10);//memportal

Change the !!! to a portal ID which your server doesn’t currently use.
Now, change the #?#? and ?#?# to the co-ords you want the portal ITSELF to be placed. We are just MAKING the portal now, it won’t have a function now (unless your server already has a built in function for it somehow).

Now, we will give the portal a function.

Search for ‘case’ in your client.java, and at the end of one of the codes (where the closing bracket is), add this:

case !!!!: // portal for whatever if (playerIsMember == 1) ; if (objectX == #?#? && objectY == ?#?#) { teleportToX = @@@@; teleportToY = @@@@; sendMessage("PORTAL MESSAGE HERE."); }

Change the @@@@s to the x and y co-ords of where you want the portal to take you respectively. Change the #?#?, ?#?# and !!! to whatever you changed them to earlier, save, compile and run and HOPEFULLY it will work. The part i am least sure about is the playerismember bit. Hopefully, only members will be able to get in.

I based this on Reapagescape source.[/quote]
I’d rep you if I could.
I’ve seen you post liek, UB3RR H3lpf00l p0stzz

Read full topic

item.title: Members portal
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

umm ill try to help but i’m warning you, i’m unrealiable.

OK, go into your client.java and find:

    public void NewObjects() {

Add this below it:

	makeGlobalObject(!!!!, #?#?, ?#?#, 0, 10);//memportal

Change the !!! to a portal ID which your server doesn’t currently use.
Now, change the #?#? and ?#?# to the co-ords you want the portal ITSELF to be placed. We are just MAKING the portal now, it won’t have a function now (unless your server already has a built in function for it somehow).

Now, we will give the portal a function.

Search for ‘case’ in your client.java, and at the end of one of the codes (where the closing bracket is), add this:

case !!!!: // portal for whatever if (playerIsMember == 1) ; if (objectX == #?#? && objectY == ?#?#) { teleportToX = @@@@; teleportToY = @@@@; sendMessage("PORTAL MESSAGE HERE."); }

Change the @@@@s to the x and y co-ords of where you want the portal to take you respectively. Change the #?#?, ?#?# and !!! to whatever you changed them to earlier, save, compile and run and HOPEFULLY it will work. The part i am least sure about is the playerismember bit. Hopefully, only members will be able to get in.

I based this on Reapagescape source.
